sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import {Container, Typography} from "@material-ui/core"; import Cookies from "universal-cookie"; import { Box, Grid, TextField, Button, Avatar, Card } from "@material-ui/core"; export default function accts() { const cookies = new Cookies(); const fname = cookies.get("firstName"); const lname = cookies.get("lastName"); const role = cookies.get("role"); const email = cookies.get("email"); //This is just filler for the accounts page which is yet to be implimented return ( /* User: {fname} {lname} Role: {role} Email Address: {email} */ {fname.toUpperCase().charAt(0) + lname.toUpperCase().charAt(0)} Account Settings Your Info Email address First Name Last Name Password New Password Confirm New Password Academic Major Graduation Year Biography Links LinkedIn Github ); }
